version_description: - Bug fixes
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Allow inputting transaction times (in addition to date) in case there are multiple transactions in the same day
- Show inline shares and price per share on the holdings tab
- Show quote price on holdings tab
- Use 24hr clock in countries that prefer 24hr format
- Fix issue where editing portfolio name does not work
- Fix issue with editing portfolio causing tab position to reset
